caption: Sapitos is the best! I love playing ping pong or pool here! They also have a caram / carambole table here, which is hard to find! We came and saw the Canelo fight here and will continue to keep coming back ☺️
The is one of the best pool halls I’ve been to in a very long time. The food is great and drinks are reasonably priced. I spent a solid 6 hours here playing and never had an issue. Thank you Sapitos
